sentences: On Tuesday, 8 December, SBSTA Chair Helen Plume (New Zealand) opened SBSTA 31.
Parties adopted the agenda ( FCCC/SBSTA/2009/4 ) and agreed to the proposed organization of work.
On 12 December, the SBSTA agreed to elect Mihir Kanti Majumder (Bangladesh) as Vice-Chair and Purushottam Ghimire (Nepal) as Rapporteur.
